topic.title: Additional Website Content
topic.section:
Scheduled Conference Redirect. This will redirect the requests to the conference web site to the scheduled conference. Typically this setting is used when the conference holds a single scheduled conference. Homepage. This is to add flavour to your conference home visually and verbally, by uploading an image and adding extra information.

Information for Users. Default information for readers and authors can be modified, which appear under Information on the right sidebar.

Announcements. This is to customize announcemnets - whether annoucements should be displayed on conference homepage, and how many to display.

Access to Conference Presentations. Three options are for allowing access to conference presentations - to anyone indiscriminately, to those who have accounts with conference web site, or to registered conference participants only.
